name: MA200-SG-K HEAVY DUTY DISPENSER
description:
1 x 2” positive displacement M7K class 1 Liquid Controls meter
- including meter element,
- mechanical counter with 5 resettable digits,
- totalizer with 8 non-resettable digits,
- 2” strainer with 40 mesh stainless steel basket,
- air-eliminator,
- mechanical preset,
- mechanical preset valve,
- 2” flanges
1 x Hose reel with 30 metres of flexible hose for hydrocarbons, Ø 32x45 (internal/external) with manual rewind
1 x Manual nozzle 980 AD (1½") with swivel and spout 40 x 50 x 200 mm
Cabinet in stainless steel (width 1253mm, depth 1150mm, height 1284mm)
Nominal flow rate: 200 LPM

Dimension of packing: Wooden cradle 145cm x 135cm x 150cm
